alert.note: Alert for Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:30PM CDT until May 30 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR EASTERN MURRAY AND COTTONWOOD COUNTIES... At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tracy to near Dovray to Fulda, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Westbrook, Storden, Jeffers and Windom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for southwestern Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
